recipesJson.name: Aqua "Pure" remix
recipesJson.author: Conradvape
recipesJson.description: after vaping Aqua "Pure" at the vape shop today the first notes I got from it was a candy watermelon with a apple hit with a very light hint of strawberry which makes for a refreshing vape for the summertime

reviews.text: No idea what the original taste like but this is pretty good.   Had to sub the LB stuff for the usual suspects.  I had some Candy Watermelon I sitting around so glad to find a good use for it.
